name: ESMF_GME_CCSM
short_description: This is a project of Coupling two models using ESMF. In this project we are interested in coupling the GME (Deutscher Wetterdienst's operational model) and CCSM_v3.0 ocean model (POP). GME, ESMF3.1, CCSM3.0 has been installed successfully on IBM p690.
